Title: Relates to Medicaid reimbursement rates for private duty nursing
Summary: Relates to Medicaid reimbursement rates for private duty nursing; requires DOH to publish a private duty rate schedule.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the social services law, in relation to rates of reimbursement for private duty nursing
